page.title: 05Crops in Bolam
page.content: In this area farmers can plough one to two acres of land in one hour.The main crops in this area are Grass, Wheat, Barley and oats,and the less common crops are Turnips, Cabbage and Oilseed rape. Barley and Wheat seed cost Â£14/ 50Kg Grass seed cost Â£20 per 14Kg. It takes 1.5 bags of Barley and Wheat and one bag of Grass per acre.Farmers grow these types of crops because Wheat and Barley are fed to the pigs.Grass(hay silage) is fed to cattle and sheep.Some farmers sell their crops and make a profit.There crops also suit the land in our area and are grown in rotation.
